name: Point-Less
description:
A platformer/puzzle game that changes the layout each time you die, and/or each time you hold and drop your chip, therefore a new beginning.

Test subjects called Freds are tasked to go through death chambers to test their agility, intelligence, and strength.

Luckily, you (the player) control the Freds through their test. TV Face will watch what the Freds do, so don't disappoint him. How many Freds will you sacrifice to the end?

The Chip is an asset the Freds need to keep since it keeps the chip-symboled doors and platforms active.

Some doors and platforms are Skull-symboled, which means they activate and deactivate each time you die.

Made for Brackey's Game Jam 2023.1

Controls :

R = Restart

AD = Move

Spacebar = Jump

W = Continue to next chamber
